---
title: "Introduction"
---

These documents are intended to help describe how to undertake analyses introduced 
as examples in the Fourth Edition of Stats: Data and Models (2014) by De Veaux, Velleman, and Bock.
More information about the book can be found [here](http://wps.aw.com/aw_deveaux_stats_series)
#http://wps.aw.com/aw_deveaux_stats_series.
<br>
This work leverages initiatives undertaken by Project MOSAIC [Project MOSAIC](http://www.mosaic-web.org), an NSF-funded effort to improve the teaching of statistics, calculus, science and computing in the undergraduate curriculum. For more information about the 'mosaic' package, visit the About tab.
